column5: Planning a fishing trip into Canada on Monday, September 2nd. I knew this was Labor Day Weekend in the U.S., but have just noticed on the calendar that it is also Labour Day in Canada. I would imagine that the Government Beer Stores would be closed on this holiday, can anyone out there tell me if they know for sure whether they will be open or closed on this holiday? Thank you.Jig'N'John

Jig'N'John:The Beer Store web site is below: http://www.thebeerstore.ca/ultimate/types_of_beer.aspThe web site doesn't specifically address any operation on holidays. Consequently, I telephoned my local beer store and they stated they would be closed on Labour Day. Jay
Thank you Jay. Will have to plan accordingly.Jig'N'John
